body:
Hey guys, back with the fifth community spotlight. For those interested in maybe getting their own, apply here. https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSey1p_zZlocebKpAkiFwnw2B7ML9-H53EXrazmDtDWhx3TiJA/viewform?...  Anyways, I present to you, Steven!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
steven5703 - avicade is my favorite game

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
Hello friends! I'm knew to the server, I joined like 3 years ago. I've built a good reputation for my self on this server and I can say with confidence that I'm the most popular player on this server and I have the most friends on this server. If you ever see me in game make sure you say hi! I'm very friendly and I will always respond x3 xP

​What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
I love the avicus server! I'm obsessed with trying to get mod!

What interests you the most in life?
Minecraft and roblox

​What music/art/media do you like?
My favorite type of media has to be minecraft videos, dank meme vine compilations and MLG montages.

​Where are you from?
New York

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?​
hacking

​Anything else you want to mention?
unban me
also if you play gta online add me on steam (steven5703)

title: Community Spotlight #5 - steven5703

Also I vouch that he spends most time on avicus hacking
